message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  Let me know if you want to go for a more even split.
Your turn Alice. I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the situation.
I'm willing to go down to 55% now.  It's still a lot, but I'm trying to be reasonable.
Let's settle this. I'll take the same cut you offered last round.
We're getting close to the end, and the money is only going to get worth less. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
